title: Goals
intro: Goals help structure time by marking where we started and how far we've come. Here are a few goals I wish to accomplish within the next few years.

goals.hope: To build language learning applications using my experience as an educator, linguist, and web designer
To incorporate animations into more projects by mastering GSAP as well as transitions
To confidantly support design decisions with sketches / realizations by mastering tools like Figma
To observe the digital and physical world through travel
